titleStmt.title: A treatise of Melchisedek prouing him to be Sem, the father of all the sonnes of Heber, the fyrst king, and all kinges glory: by the generall consent of his owne sonnes, by the continuall iudgement of ages, and by plentifull argumentes of scripture.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Richard Watkins] for Gabriel Simson and William White,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
